ygData.msgSnippet: (Code, (no offense meant to Liono), but yes, RgDan does mode.  But just because he modes numerous times, does NOT mean you get to, and it s no excuse.  RgDan

(Code, (no offense meant to Liono), but yes, RgDan does mode.  But just 
because he modes numerous times, does NOT mean you get to, and it's no 
excuse.  RgDan has been spoken too, and if nothing is done by him, further 
action will be taken.  Heck, I don't really agree with 'Stinger being able to 
move the Autobots and Decepticons where ever that person wants, I think of it 
as a little along the lines of moding.  But if that wasn't done, we'd have 
people joining the Maximal side just so they could go off and blow up 
Autobots and Decepticons for kicks.  Just try and not do such impossible 
stuff)

Koga Shuko/Unitron:

::Shuko shook his head, on his way to meet with this Hell Beast fellow, 
accompanied by Unitron, whom had 'boarded' their ship::
::Turning a corner, both Predacons spotted Killer opening fire at Hell Beast 
from behind::
::Jumping to conclusions, Koga Shuko pulled out two laser pistols, opening 
fire on Hell Beast::

"I'll take the little one!" Unitron yelled, pulling out his custom-made laser 
rifle, firing off a few shots at Jackle.
